title: ElayyA beLagAyitu
sahitya:
ElayyA beLagAyitu ElayyA


anupallavi

  Elu nArAyaNa Elu lakSmIramaNA Elu shrI giriyoDadeya vnkaTEshA


caraNam 1    dAsarellaru bandu dULi darshana koNDu lEsAgi tALAdaNDigeya piDidu 
kEshavane nim siri nAmavanu smarissudali vAsudEvanE udayadali pADutiharu
    caraNam 2    kAsitta hAlugaLa kAvaDiya tumbiTTu lEsAgi kenemosaru beNNeyanu meddu 
shESa shayananE Elu samudra madhanavamADu dEshakempAya tELayya hariyE
    caraNam 3    haraLu mallige jAji parimaLada puSpagaLa surarutanditarayyA sujanaroDeya 
aravinda lOcananE kOLi kUgidu Elu purandara viTTalanE beLagAyitu
